Articles.Content:
kerbals are small. and thus so are access tunnels

I think access tunnels would take up more room than my little airlock.

Did you dump all the parts folders, in the parts folder?

I transferred all my addons (700mb) to ksp .13 Several didn\'t work so I decided to redownload KSP and put in packs one by one. I downloaded the latest version, unzipped it, and copied all folders into the ksp_win_0_13/KSP/Parts folder. They don\'t show up in the VAB. Also your plf set doesn\'t appear either

my little airlock

This inspired me to write a song...

My little airlock, my little airlock

AAAAAAAHHHH DEAR GOD

My little airlock

I used to wonder what oxygen could be

My little airlock

Until you shared asphyxiation with me

Big-ass air pump

Tons of death

A non-beating heart

A lack of breath

Sharing the airspace

It\'s an easy feat

And docking makes it all complete

Yeah, my little airlock

Don\'t you know you\'ll get the bends?
Is there some tune we should be thinking of while reading that?

Is there some tune we should be thinking of while reading that?

The MLP theme... :-[

The MLP theme... :-[

'slowly backs away'

*walks into the room with gun and kills everyone*

Stop being stupid Ping111.

*walks into the room with gun and kills everyone*

Stop being stupid Ping111.

Lol, sorry.

The MLP theme... :-[

This means WAR!

This means WAR!

EXTRA! EXTRA! Silisko Industries Unlimited declares war on the Royal Kerbal Military over Pony row!
This thread has been throughly derailed. Soo back on topic. Any idea why I would be having these problems?

This thread has been throughly derailed. Soo back on topic. Any idea why I would be having these problems?

Because there are the people who like MLP, and they constantly post macro\'s of it. And there are some of us who hate MLP for there various reasons. Then people make stupid comments about the \'wars\'.

If there were a seperate subforum for War and MLP went into the offtopic then we wouldn\'t have derailed this, and probably many threads.

Because there are the people who like MLP, and they constantly post macro\'s of it. And there are some of us who hate MLP for there various reasons. Then people make stupid comments about the \'wars\'.

If there were a seperate subforum for War and MLP went into the offtopic then we wouldn\'t have derailed this, and probably many threads.

...Not that topic...

venku122, I\'m not sure why you would be having problems, but have you tried loading just the KW Challenger pack by itself? It\'s possible there\'s a conflict between part names in different packs, in the .cfg\'s.

Because there are the people who like MLP, and they constantly post macro\'s of it. And there are some of us who hate MLP for there various reasons. Then people make stupid comments about the \'wars\'.

If there were a seperate subforum for War and MLP went into the offtopic then we wouldn\'t have derailed this, and probably many threads.

Got a stick up your arse there boy?

Moving back on topic towards some effusive praise.....

this set of parts is fantastic - I especially love the payload fairings, and your LEM.

The upcoming shuttle looks great as well.

Moving back on topic towards some effusive praise.....

this set of parts is fantastic - I especially love the payload fairings, and your LEM.

The upcoming shuttle looks great as well.

Thanks. 0.13 killed the LEM, at some point I\'ll get round to splitting the legs into separate parts and releasing a new version, but currently I want to concentrate on the shuttle. Kyle and I have been brainstorming names for it, any suggestions?
Euryale?

Kyle and I have been brainstorming names for it, any suggestions?

So a question about the KW-LEM.

Mine seems to be broken, somehow.

Here\'s what it looks like when unattached.

And here attached.

I can see the struts, but they\'re covered over by this weird stretched-texture thingy. Not sure what the deal is. What\'s going on here?

I explained this either a couple pages back or in another thread - the old version of KSP supported multiple collision meshes, but not anymore. So now it\'s rendering them just like regular model parts.
